title: Collaborative Learning Program for Strengthening Customized Diabetes Educator Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic diabetes concepts and foundational teaching experience
context.additional_context: Hybrid environment combining smartphone-based mobile learning and in-person workshops, operating during weekends/evenings for working professionals

learning_goals: Cultivation of the ability to design personalized blood glucose management education programs reflecting learners' cultural and individual backgrounds
Development of strategies to enhance diabetic patients' self-efficacy through collaborative goal setting
Acquisition of practical problem-solving skills for effective educational implementation in resource-constrained environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
